definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: The more dye molecules there are, the more light is lost.
sentences.chinese: 当板上的色块分子越多，光线的散失就厉害。

sentences.english: Microleakage is one of the most important pathways in which the natural gas diffuses through caprocks .
sentences.chinese: 微渗漏是天然气通过盖层散失的重要方式之一。

sentences.english: As a result, much of the energy is lost to air.
sentences.chinese: 结果其中大部分能量散失于空气中。

sentences.english: The function of stomata in plants is controlling gas exchange and modulating water balance.
sentences.chinese: 气孔是植物控制气体交换和调节水分散失的门户。

sentences.english: Smoke has no value in preventing heat-loss.
sentences.chinese: 烟对于防止热量散失没有作用。

sentences.english: Guttation Loss of water as liquid from the surface of a plant.
sentences.chinese: 水分从植物表面散失的现象。

sentences.english: Stomatal movement is important for plants to exchange gas with environment.
sentences.chinese: 气孔是植物控制气体交换和调节水分散失的门户。

sentences.english: The atmosphere is acting like the glass letting sunlight in while keeping much of the warmth from getting out.
sentences.chinese: 大气层像个玻璃罩，吸入阳光而阻止热量散失。

sentences.english: The blubber helps to stop them from losing their body heat.
sentences.chinese: 鲸脂有助于防止身体热量的散失。

sentences.english: The loot feed and eel faces are the ma jor causes for pond water pollution.
sentences.chinese: 饲料散失和鳗鱼粪便是造成水质污染的主要根源。

sentences.english: Loss of water also includes the transpiration of water to the atmosphere from plants.
sentences.chinese: 水的散失也包括从植物体中蒸腾到大气层中的水。

sentences.english: In the cloudless night ground temperature decreases on account of the heat lost to the space.
sentences.chinese: 在无云夜间地面温度由于其热量散失到空间而下降。

sentences.english: The double wall incubators had advantages as far as decreasing heat loss and decreasing heat production.
sentences.chinese: 双层墙壁保温箱的优点有减少热散失及减少热产生。

sentences.english: If I'm gaining or losing smoke, it means it must be going up there.
sentences.chinese: 如果有烟雾流入或者散失，就是往别处去了。

sentences.english: A low rate is enough to prevent flushing of reductants.
sentences.chinese: 缓慢的流速足以防止还原剂的散失。

definition: (of soil etc) to wash away/to be eroded/(fig.) (of talented staff, followers of a religious faith, investment funds etc) to go elsewhere/to fail to be retained
